= Introduction =

This document contains the instructions to set up the Live Notes Server.

= Details =

Copy the follow script into `install-live-notes-server.sh`:

{{{
# https://github.com/harrah/xsbt/wiki/Setup
cd ~/dev/tools
git clone https://github.com/harrah/xsbt.git
wget http://typesafe.artifactoryonline.com/typesafe/ivy-releases/org.scala-tools.sbt/sbt-launch/0.11.2/sbt-launch.jar
echo 'java -Xmx512M -jar `dirname $0`/sbt-launch.jar "$@"' > sbt
chmod a+x sbt
sudo mv sbt-launch.jar sbt /usr/bin/

sudo wget https://raw.github.com/ielashi/bbb-notes-client-module/master/jsp/notes.jsp /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/demo/
sudo chown tomcat6:tomcat6 /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/demo/notes.jsp

cd ~/dev
git clone git://github.com/mconf/live-notes-server.git
echo 'cd ~/dev/live-notes-server; sbt "run 8095"' >> live-notes-server
chmod a+x live-notes-server
sudo mv live-notes-server /usr/bin/
}}}

Then run:

{{{
chmod +x install-live-notes-server.sh
./install-live-notes-server.sh
}}}
